overview: Joseph, a story of dreams and the power of forgiveness, is now available on DVD! Captured before a live audience, you'll soar along with Joseph as he takes flight in his colorful coat! You'll be immersed in all the action with intimate close-ups, sweeping dramatic shots and exhilarating production numbers. You'll also experience exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes footage revealing how this Biblical epic was taken from script to the stage.
title: Joseph
